data.name: The Adventures of Detective Bron
data.detailed_description:
In «The Adventures of Detective Bron» you’ll take on the role of detective Bron, who faces various mysteries that are waiting to be solved.
Missions are going to be different: solving a murder case, searching for maniacs and missing people, solving a robery case and much more.
  • Solve crimes;
  • Make important notes with your notepad;
  • Use all your logical skills to solve the crime;
  • Pay attention, no one will lead you by the hand.
data.about_the_game:
In «The Adventures of Detective Bron» you’ll take on the role of detective Bron, who faces various mysteries that are waiting to be solved.
Missions are going to be different: solving a murder case, searching for maniacs and missing people, solving a robery case and much more.
  • Solve crimes;
  • Make important notes with your notepad;
  • Use all your logical skills to solve the crime;
  • Pay attention, no one will lead you by the hand.
data.short_description: The Adventures of Detective Bron is a detective-adventure game in which you have to investigate all kinds of crimes: from murders and missing people to robberies. Solve all the mysteries and test your deductive skills!
data.supported_languages: English, Russian, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM

movies.name: The Adventures of Detective Bron — Teaser

content_descriptors.notes: The game features dead people with traces of violent death, there is blood. Verbally the possibilities of a sexual assault scene. Nudity is not represented.
